reporter_caption.center: O'BRIEN v. TOWN OF WEATHERSFIELD ZONING BD. ADJUSTMENT, 137 Vt. 638 (1979)

caption.center: William and Helen O'BRIEN v. TOWN OF WEATHERSFIELD ZONING BOARD OF
ADJUSTMENT, Richard F. Whitcomb, Ralph Osgood and Janice Osgood

opinion.opinion_text: Cause to be set for hearing during the November session of the October Term, 1979.
